verbs.description: iran cracks down on women rights activists as [ARG0: leader] [V: offers] [ARG1: his solution to sexual harassment assault cover up] iran supreme leader ayatollah ali khamenei used the one - year anniversary of the global metoo movement to push women to wear islamic head scarves ignoring the growing anger and unrest over iran law that mandates women wear head scarves in public aly raisman iran u s larry nassar sen elizabeth warren assault executive director elizabeth warren harassment center for human rights harvey weinstein khamenei los angeles times rights hadi ghaemi
